Translations.Text: Amaboko yombi ya Abu Lahab147 arakorama (kubera ko yayakoreshaga abangamira Intumwa y’Imana), ndetse na we ubwe azorama
Umutungo we n’urubyaro rwe ntacyo bizamumarira
Ndetse n’umugore we watwaraga ibiti (by’amahwa yajyaga atega mu nzira Intumwa y’Imana yanyuragamo)
Mu ijosi rye (uwo mugore) hazaba hari umurunga wo mu muriro
